fullgame.name: Travis Strikes Again: No More Heroes Complete Edition

name: Travis Strikes Again: No More Heroes Complete Edition - Original Soundtrack

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: Travis Strikes Again: No More Heroes Complete Edition - Original Soundtrack - $9.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy Travis Strikes Again: No More Heroes Complete Edition - Original Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit | Windows 8 64-bit | Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4160
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 520
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2450 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Compatible

short_description: A tight selection of tracks ripped out of Travis Strikes Again: No More Heroes, courtesy of Japanese indie legends MEBEE and #_SUPERCOMBO, with vocals by 9nine, Tatsuya Gakushuin, and BGM compositions by Jun Fukuda.

support_info.email: asia_support_global@marv.jp English Support/日本語サポート
